subject: Football
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Brady, who accepted his M.V.P. award Monday morning, said, “Coach talked all week about how it was going to take all 60 minutes, and it certainly did.”
snippet: Brady, who accepted his M.V.P. award Monday morning, said, “Coach talked all week about how it was going to take all 60 minutes, and it certainly did.”
